channel.title: Case Deflection on Salesforce Tek Talks
channel.description: Recent content in Case Deflection on Salesforce Tek Talks

item.title: Lightning Web Component Community Case Creation
item.description: In this post we will create a case creation form, using the lightning-record-edit-form component alongise proper redirection to the record page once the button has been submitted. Getting Started You will need to get yourself setup with Salesforce-DX, if you haven’t had the chance to do so, this is a good time to get your environemnt setup since we will use it to deploy our LWC to a scratch org for testing.

item.title: Case Deflection from A-Z
item.description: French Touch Dreamin 2019 Case Deflection from A-Z During this speaker session I did an overview of customizing a complete Contact Support Form alongside a Custom Deflection component in Lightning Communities.
